entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Question] JIT/Directed/debugging/debuginfo/tester fail with DOTNET_TieredCompilation=0 on Linux #104451
  • Assertion failed `(pThread->m_StateNC & Thread::TSNC_OwnsSpinLock) == 0` #104449
    9.0.0
  • JIT build failure with clang 10 #104442
  • JIT: Spurious 0-sized diffs in smoke_tests.nativeaot.windows.arm64 #104441
  • HostFxr - calling load_assembly_and_get_function_pointer return -2146234280 #104436
  • [mono] Failure LambdaCompilerAot tests due to attempts of JIT compiling method while in aot-only mode. #104431
  • Apple mobile JIT_Directed runtime tests failures: System.DllNotFoundException: EmptyStructsLib #104430
  • Should .NET Generic Host call IHostApplicationLifetime.StopApplication for unhandled domain exceptions? #104428
  • Question around DiagnosticSource & DiagnosticListener & execution context #104427
    Future
  • [QUIC & HTTP/3] Handshake Timeout on tests #104426
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: support thread dump on `kill -3` #104425
  • Dev/Debug mode experience #104424
  • Customize bundle extract base directory within the app #104422
  • System.Numerics.Complex Parse (string s, IFormatProvider? provider) don't work #104421
  • [browser] HttpClientHandlerTest.ReadAsStreamAsync_Cancellation - No exception was thrown #104419
    9.0.0
  • AccessViolationException on LibraryImportGenerator unit test on release coreclr osx x64 Debug #104415
  • /build/gdb-Dh0pdX/gdb-12.1/gdb/jit.c:1252: internal-error: jit_event_handler: Assertion `jiter->jiter_data != nullptr' failed. #104413

Closed

  • Duplicate information in structured json logs #104409
    Future
  • [apple] TvOS/MacCatalyst/iOSSimulator X509Certificates failures during AppleCrypto interop #104161
  • [libraries-jitstress] `System.Runtime.Intrinsics.Tests.Vectors.Vector512Tests.Vector512DoubleEqualsNonCanonicalNaNTest` fails in CI on win-x64 #104317
    9.0.0
  • Let Utf8JsonReader process input with one complete JSON document per line #33030
    9.0.0
  • EF tools install makes a strange error on UBUNTU #100539
    Future
  • [iOS][globalization][icu] Tracking issue for HybridGlobalization: Native API + ICU #80689
    9.0.0
  • [wasi] Failing test `System.Globalization.Tests.CalendarTests.TestJapaneseCalendarDateParsing` #82965
    9.0.0
  • [jitstress] JIT\Regression\JitBlue\Runtime_90423 fails with "Assertion failed '(op2 == idx) || (op2->gtEffectiveVal() == idx)' during 'Find oper order'" #103577
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] WasmTemplateTests for console failing due to truncated output #71887
    8.0.0
  • Firefox-MT: [MONO] * Assertion at /__w/1/s/src/mono/mono/metadata/object.c:2029, condition `klass' not met #101929
    9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] TIMED_OUT #104418
    9.0.0
  • Ios Maui sample app uses Chinese Simplified when Chinese Traditional is set in phone preferences #102560
  • Test failure: Expect100Continue_WaitsExpectedPeriodOfTimeBeforeSendingContent #58628
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] Some AOT configuration combinations to disallow #94103
    9.0.0
  • [browser] System.Memory.Tests is taking too long on FF #103829
    9.0.0
  • [runtime-extra-platforms] tvossimulator-x64 mono failure in CultureName_Set_Invalid_ThrowsCultureNotFoundException: no exception thrown #104346
  • Potential improvements for System.Numerics.Complex #104233
  • Decide on a policy for duplicate attributes on PKCS12 values #103924
    9.0.0
  • VectorX<T>.ConditionalSelect doesn’t get optimized for const masks on non-AVX512 platforms #104001
    Future
  • Dotnet apps fail to start when run in a directory containing a backslash #75387
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove `virtual` modifier from `GetDatePart` #104456
    area-System.Globalization, community-contribution
  • Swap MetricsHandler and DiagnosticsHandler #104455
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Migrate to zlib-ng, part 2: consume it in runtime (second attempt) #104454
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Remove `virtual` modifier from `Calendar.CurrentEraValue` #104453
    area-System.Globalization, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Fix "elaborated type specifier" for enum class in JIT #104450
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix size of dirent buffer on illumos #104448
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Disable tests for illumos that depend on a pre-built nethost binary #104447
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [wasi] enable WASMTIME_BACKTRACE_DETAILS #104446
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 9.0.0
  • Have mono handle the vector as APIs that grow or shrink the vector type #104445
    area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • [QUIC] Fixed some tests leaking unobserved exceptions #104444
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [iOS][non-icu] Clean up ICU related files from runtime pack #104443
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Globalization, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Handle top-level UseSystemLibs argument from the VMR #104440
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • JIT: Skip old promotion for retbuf defined locals #104439
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Disable old promotion for structs with significant padding #104438
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add support for reverse pinvoke argument lowering #104437
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-VM-meta-mono
  • In Dns.RunAsync calls AfterResolution when canceled #104435
    area-System.Net, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Fix a typo in browser-bench wasm app #104434
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [Apple] Disable EmptyStructs tests for apple mobile due to missing support for native libraries #104433
    arch-arm64, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, os-tvos
  • JIT: Remove `CallArg::m_tmpNum` #104429
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix cancelability of DNS queries #104420
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 9.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Onboard new inter-branch merge flow [Workflow] #104417
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • [LibraryImportGenerator] Use basic forwarder in down-level support if any parameters can't be marshalled #104416
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Fix GetStaticsBases #104412
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Enable "Allocate on stack" for NAOT/R2R #104411
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Merged

  • [HttpClientFactory] Do not log query string by default #103769
    breaking-change, area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 9.0.0
  • Revert "Migrate to zlib-ng, part 2: consume it in runtime" #104414
    area-Build-mono
  • JIT: Extract StructSegments to its own file #104432
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix certificate test failures on iOS(-likes) #104410
    area-System.Security
  • Use the maskBaseType when consuming a mask directly as part of KORTEST #104364
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve build error on systems that have a 32-bit time_t #104368
    area-System.Security, 9.0.0
  • Add Utf8JsonReader.AllowMultipleValues and related APIs. #104328
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Small clean up in gtMarkAddrMode #104387
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove uses of CLRJIT_AZ_KEY/clrjit_key1 from SPMI #104164
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Enable `WasmTemplateTests` #104357
    arch-wasm, disabled-test, area-Build-mono
  • [wasi] Implement TODO in mono-threads-wasi.S #101337
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [wasm] Disallow not useful configuration combinations #104149
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [browser] default WasmDebugLevel to 0 for tests #104361
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Add a disabled-by-default implementation of strength reduction #104243
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [iOS][HybridGlobalization] Disable CultureName_Set_Invalid_ThrowsCultureNotFoundException test #104382
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Arm64/Sve: Do not mark *Prefetch* APIs as MEMORY_LOAD #104396
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make CertLoader reject duplicate attributes #104344
    area-System.Security, 9.0.0
  • fix the size passed to grow_heap_segment from loh_allocate_in_condemned #103998
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add support for other same size vector bitcasts to Mono #104309
    area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • Optimize VectorX<T>.ConditionalSelect for constant masks #104092
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

Updated

  • Enable TLS on linux/arm64 only for static resolver #104408
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Reimplement LINQ ToList using SegmentedArrayBuilder to reduce allocations #104365
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] Add nativeaot support on LoongArch64. #103889
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, arch-loongarch64
  • [RISC-V][LoongArch64] New passing info for floating-point structs #103945
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, arch-riscv
  • Implement `IUtf8SpanParsable` on `IPAddress` and `IPNetwork` #102144
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2488849 #103583
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Improve `JsonNode.DeepEquals` numeric equality. #104255
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Reduce allocations in Quic/HTTP3 #104394
    area-System.Net.Quic, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Transform multi-reg args to FIELD_LIST in physical promotion #104370
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Migrate to zlib-ng, part 3: Remove zlib and zlib-intel source code and license mentions #104399
    NO-MERGE, area-System.IO.Compression
  • [wasi] upgrade to WASIp2 + wasi:http #103752
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • [mono][swift-interop] Support for Swift struct lowering in direct P/Invoke returns #104389
    arch-arm64, arch-x64, area-Codegen-meta-mono, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] emscripten bump 3.1.56 #100334
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [Android] Resolve Android-specific System.Net.Security active issues #104352
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android
  • NonBacktracking Regex optimizations #102655
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Only build applicable build Tasks when building the repo #104226
    area-Infrastructure
  • [RISC-V] Fix System.Net.Sockets.Tests on Qemu #104094
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Test HybridGlobalization with AOT on CI #104027
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasi] sdk22 path #104379
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • Improve performance of interface method resolution in ILC #103066
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Don't use SyncTextWriter in single-threaded wasm builds #101221
    arch-wasm
  • Optimize 'x & cns == cns' pattern #103868
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add Decimal32, Decimal64, Decimal128 #100729
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • JIT: Fix some ssize_t -> handle casts #104404
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add standard tags to HttpClient native trace instrumentation #104251
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [RISC-V] JIT: pass structs according to floating-point calling convention properly #104237
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [QUIC&H/3] QuicConnection handshake timeout #104358
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Refactor WinHttpHandler test to use LoopbackServer.CreateClientAndServer #104400
    area-System.Net
  • [RISC-V] Fix coreclr test coreroot_determinism.sh #104140
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Allow LARGE_REGION_FACTOR to be configurable #104403
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Remove unnecessary endianness dependent logic #104332
    area-System.Memory
  • Remove non INPLACE_RUNTIME NativeAOT paths, cleanup exceptions #100379
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Port yield normalization from CoreCLR to Native AOT #103675
    area-System.Threading
  • Do not encode safe points with -1 offset. #104336
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Update EOL versions (8.0-staging) #103393
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Optimize BigInteger.Divide #96895
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • RunWithFakeThreshold with DisableParallelization #103423
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Implement various other simple vector APIs from 93513 #103837
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
